name: Thunder Manifestation
desc:
"Lingering Hatred" Thunder Manifestation

As long as the grudges of the land do not fade, so will the roaring thunder persist.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Lament of the Thunder Manifestation

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "Guests at the tavern sometimes tell us stories too. I remember one particular legend from Inazuma well â€” it was said that on a certain island shrouded in dark clouds and lightning, there were times when a shrill sound would carry on the air..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Thunder Manifestation" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, and starts with "Elemental Lifeform: Electro" attached to it. It will also deal +1 DMG to characters affected by "Lightning Rod."</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Howl of the Thunder Manifestation

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "It seems that none know what that purple being has been through, but its long, drawn-out cry seems to exude an air of... sorry?"
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Thunder Manifestation" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, and starts with "Elemental Lifeform: Electro" attached to it. It will also deal +1 DMG to characters affected by "Lightning Rod."</color>

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Thunder Manifestation

value.name: Thunder Manifestation
value.desc:
An abnormal Electro elemental life form. Although it might appear similar to an Oceanid, it does not possess her intelligence or memories.
That which drives the Thunder Manifestation is a much more primal fury.
It is said that these life forms will only descend like lightning upon places that play host to great lingering resentment, such as the fragmented Amakumo Peak, where the storm clouds ever roil. As long as the grudges of the land do not fade, so will the roaring thunder persist.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 3 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> to the opposing character affected by <color=#ffffff>Lightning Rod</color> . (If there are no eligible opposing characters, deals DMG to the active character instead)
<color=#ece5d8>Lightning Rod</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the attached character takes DMG from Thunder Manifestation or its summons:</color> Remove this state, cause this DMG instance to increase by 1.
(Only one of this status can exist on the field at once. Some of Thunder Manifestation's skills will target the character to which this is attached.)

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) When battle begins, create a <color=#ffffff>Lightning Strike Probe</color> on the opponent's side of the field.
<color=#ece5d8>Lightning Strike Probe</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After a character on whose side of the field this card is on uses a Skill:</color> Attach <color=#ffffff>Lightning Rod</color> to the active character on that side. (Once per Round)

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deals 3 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> to the opposing character affected by <color=#ffffff>Lightning Rod</color> . (If there are no eligible opposing characters, deals DMG to the active character instead)
<color=#ffffff>U</color> <color=#ffffff>sage(s): 1</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Lightning Rod</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the attached character takes DMG from Thunder Manifestation or its summons:</color> Remove this state, cause this DMG instance to increase by 1.
(Only one of this status can exist on the field at once. Some of Thunder Manifestation's skills will target the character to which this is attached.)

Applies Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
